scripts.build:extension: npm run style && BABEL_ENV=production gulp build:extension
scripts.style: mkdir -p build/extension/css 2>/dev/null && node-sass src/app/styles/stylesheet.scss --output-style=compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -o build/extension/css/stylesheet.css && cp -r src/app/styles/images build/extension/
scripts.release:extension: rm -rf releases/* && npm run style && rm -f config.json && cp config.json.edge config.json && BABEL_ENV=production gulp build:extension && zip -r releases/bridge-edge.zip build/extension && cp config.json.live config.json && BABEL_ENV=production gulp build:extension && zip -r releases/bridge-live.zip build/extension && cp config.json.example config.json && BABEL_ENV=production gulp build:extension
scripts.publish:extension: rm -f config.json && cp config.json.edge config.json && ./scripts/chrome-store.sh && cp config.json.live config.json && ./scripts/chrome-store.sh && cp config.json.example config.json
scripts.test: cd test && bundle install && rspec && cd ..
